headers: NETWORK VELOCITY: HOW TO KNOW THE RIGHT PEOPLE FAST

rows.NETWORK VELOCITY: HOW TO KNOW THE RIGHT: Strategy for building the right relationships in 3 weeks, not 3 months.
THE CONSTRAINT
In 3 weeks, you need: 1 VA, 1 CoS (with capital), 6-8 experts, 2-3 VP candidates,
3-5 investor conversations, and 2-3 operator candidates. That's ~20-25 people.
You can't cold-call your way to 25 people in 3 weeks.
You need a network strategy that compounds.
STRATEGY: CONCENTRIC ACTIVATION
Ring 1: NILO'S DIRECT NETWORK (Day 1-3)
People Nilo already knows who could be CoS, expert, or introduce to one.
Action: 10-15 personal messages. Not mass outreach. Individual asks.
Target: 1 CoS candidate + 3-4 expert/VP warm intros.
The CoS is the multiplier. Get this one right and Rings 2-3 happen automatically.
Ring 2: CoS's NETWORK (Day 4-10)
The CoS you hire knows people Nilo doesn't.
Action: CoS maps their network on Day 1 of onboarding. Who do they know
in finance, product, marketing, legal, ops? Those become expert sessions.
Target: 4-6 expert sessions booked. 2-3 VP candidates identified.
Ring 3: EXPERT REFERRALS (Day 10-21)
Every expert session ends with: 'Who else should we talk to?'
Experts know other experts. Happy experts make introductions.
Target: 2-3 investor intros. 2-3 operator candidates.
Each ring opens from the ring before it. You don't need 25 contacts on Day 1.
You need 1 great CoS on Day 5 who opens 15 doors in Week 2.
ACCELERATORS
1. The imagination asset IS the outreach tool.
Don't send a deck. Send a Claude Project link.
'Ask Claude anything about this business' is a more compelling pitch than any PDF.
People engage with interactive things. A 694-tab AI-navigable model is interactive.
2. YC / Greylock / KV network.
Nilo is a YC-backed, Greylock-backed, KV-backed founder. That's a warm intro to
hundreds of operators, investors, and domain experts. Use the alumni networks.
3. Tabs as social currency.
Nilo has 100M+ monthly organic views through Tabs. That's a distribution channel.
A single post about 'we built a 694-tab operating system for launching D2C brands'
generates inbound from operators, experts, and investors.
4. Expert sessions generate content.
Every expert review can be turned into a case study, tweet thread, or blog post
(with permission). 'A supplement formulator reviewed our AI-generated ops model.'
This attracts more experts, more operators, more investors.
5. Sound-swim.com as venue.
For high-value relationships (CoS, key VPs, investors): invite to the property.
70 acres, 10 waterfalls, Atlantic Forest. Nobody forgets that meeting.
THE READINESS CHECKLIST (Before Day 1)
Everything that needs to be TRUE before you start the 3-week sprint:
☐  Imagination asset complete (694-tab Trade, all tabs filled)
☐  M0 locked (thesis, ICP, unit economics, reference model, kill criteria)
☐  Claude Project set up with full Trade as context
☐  VA job posting written and ready to go live
☐  CoS brief written (The Ask per Role — CoS section)
☐  Expert brief template ready (PM Brief Template)
☐  Start Here doc updated for external audience
☐  Nilo's warm intro list drafted (10-15 names for Ring 1)
☐  Entity formation research done (VA can execute on Day 1)
☐  Bank account requirements known (VA can open in Week 1)
If all 10 are checked, you can start Monday.
